Initial release of the Hetzner Cloud API SDK.

## Features

- Fully async API client — all methods return `PromiseInterface`
- Typed readonly models with `static create()` factories
- Bearer token obfuscation in logs and exception messages
- Custom Guzzle handler stack with connect retry, obfuscated logging, and retry-after middleware
- PSR-3 logger and PSR-16 cache integration

## Supported Resources

- **Servers** — list, get, create, delete, power on/off, rebuild
- **Firewalls** — list, get, create, delete, set rules, apply/remove resources
- **SSH Keys** — list, get, create, delete
- **Actions** — get
